content: p2tog - 15sts pm on last st for left wing to leg top marker row 8 increase with yarn dd k2 ac k2 dd k2 ac k2 dd k2 ac k3 dd k1 kfb - 16sts a alternating with yarn dd and ac cast off all 16 left wing sts purl-wise right wing lower edge with the right wing facing you and the right wing marker to your left with yarn fig 8 ac starting at the lower wing end marker pick up and knit 2 sts along the cast-off edge then pick up and knit 13 sts into row ends towards the right wing marker - 15sts - ref fig 8 pick up and knit from c to d d to e fig 7 wol page 16 wol page 17 row 1 purl you ll now join on yarn dd as follows row 2 increase with yarn ac kfb k1 with yarn dd k2 ac k2 dd k2 ac k2 dd k2 ac k3 - 16sts row 3 decrease with yarn ac p2tog p1 with yarn dd p2 ac p2 dd p2 ac p2 dd a p2 ac p3 - 15sts row 4 increase with yarn dd kfb with yarn ac k2 dd k2 ac k2 dd k2 ac k2 b dd k2 ac k2 - 16sts row 5 decrease with yarn ac p2tog with yarn dd p2 ac p2 dd p2 ac p2 dd p2 ac p2 dd p2 - 15sts row 6 increase with yarn dd kfb k1 with yarn ac k2 dd k2 ac k2 dd k2 ac k2 dd k2 ac k1 - 16sts this is where the breast was picked up row 7 decrease pm on first st for right wing to leg top marker with yarn dd and knitted p2tog p1 with yarn ac p2 dd p2 ac p2 dd p2 ac p2 dd p3- 15sts fig 9 row 8 increase with yarn dd kfb k1 ac k3 dd k2 ac k2 dd k2 ac k2 dd k2 - 16sts alternating with yarn dd and ac cast off all 16 left wing sts purl-wise join head side edges to face front edges working on one side at a time ws together match neck marker to the corner of b the breast where you picked up and knitted for breast sts - left neck marker to left- a side corner and visa-versa and work a couple of stitches to hold in place work mattress stitch to join each side of the head sides to the face from the neck markers to the head back markers - ref fig 9 join a to b as dotted lines show remove head back markers fig 10 wol page 18 wol page 19 join wing edges to breast front edges working on one side at a time ws together match wing marker to the breast marker and work mattress stitch to join the side of the breast to the edge of the wing from the wing/ breast markers
